test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_action
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: first
            type: number
          - name: second
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: first
            value: 100
          - output: second
            value: 200

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_action
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: first
            type: number
          - name: second
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: first
            value: 50
          - output: second
            operation: ADD
            values:
              - $first
              - 25
